description: Whether you're shoveling the driveway or walking to work, the Arctic Outpost Leather Lace Ankle with Arctic Grip is an ideal all-purpose winter boot. Easy to pull on for cold, wet, ice or snow, this mid-height boot is layered with warm fleece lining to keep you warm and comfortable even in harsh conditions. The outsole features Vibram Arctic Grip with Icetrek, the new ground-breaking sole technology specifically engineered to perform in wet or dry ice conditions. Vibram Arctic Grip is the most advanced cold weather gripping system Vibram has ever created; now you can tread on the iciest of surfaces with confidence.
name: Muck Arctic Outpost Lace Ankle AG  - Mens
